title: Green chilli stuffed mushrooms
ingredients: ['8 medium mushrooms', '1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 green chilli, seeds removed and finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '85g cream cheese, softened', '3 tablespoons grated Cheddar cheese', '2 rashers streaky bacon, cooked and chopped', 'sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
